scripts.publish:libs: npm run build:libs; lerna publish --skip-git; npm run bumpVersion:libs
scripts.nightwatch_parallel: nx build remix-ide-e2e; nx e2e remix-ide-e2e -env=chrome,firefox
scripts.nightwatch_local_firefox: nx build remix-ide-e2e; nx e2e remix-ide-e2e --env=firefox
scripts.nightwatch_local_chrome: nx build remix-ide-e2e; nx e2e remix-ide-e2e --env=chrome

scripts.remixd: nx build remixd; nx serve remixd --folder=./apps/remix-ide/contracts --remixide=http://127.0.0.1:8080
scripts.test-browser: npm-run-all -lpr selenium downloadsolc_root make-mock-compiler serve browsertest
scripts.reinstall: rm ./node-modules/ -rf; rm package-lock.json; rm ./build/ -rf; npm install; npm run build
